about_the_game:
GRASSASSINS: THE ULTIMATE GAME OF HIDE-AND-SEEK MAYHEM!

Step into the stealthy world of Grassassins, where the long grass isn't just for blending in—it's your best friend and your fiercest adversary. Gather your crew for an intense 2-4 player showdown, where cunning, strategy, and a dash of luck determine the ultimate victor!

SNEAK, SLASH, DIVE, SURVIVE!

Navigate sprawling fields of lush grass across diverse environments, utilizing every trick in the book to outsmart your opponents. From sneaky dodges to precision knife throws, every move could spell victory or defeat.

A GAME FOR ALL SKILL LEVELS

Designed with accessibility in mind, Grassassins bridges generations and skill levels, from kids to grandparents and everyone in between. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a casual player, young or young at heart, there's endless fun waiting in the tall grass for you.

UNLEASH THE FAMILY RIVALRY

What better way to bond (or ignite a bit of friendly competition) than with some good old-fashioned grassy antics? Bring Grassassins to your next family gathering, birthday bash, or impromptu game night and watch the chaos unfold!

PERSONALIZE YOUR PRESENCE

From quirky costumes to outrageous accessories, let your imagination run wild as you craft your perfect assassin. Stand out from the crowd and strut your stuff on the winner's podium in style!

Gear up, get sneaky, and prepare for a wild ride in Grassassins

name: Grassassins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 630/Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RTX570
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Gather your crew for an intense 2-4 player showdown in Grassassins, where stealth, cunning, and strategy will determines who is the ultimate Assassin!
